main event: A witness observed a bright luminous green egg-shaped object moving silently and at high speed over Marshall, Texas on May 15, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 10,000 feet altitude moving at an estimated speed of 1,000 miles per hour or greater,The sighting lasted for about 60 seconds,The object was initially observed as a bright light growing to twice the size of the moon,It oscillated to one side during its flight,The witness stated this phenomenon was unexplained and recommended investigation.
sighted object: a bright luminous green egg-shaped object
witness description: a private pilot with twenty years of experience
